Article Title: 5 best FragPunk Shard Cards you must unlock right away
Article Text:
5 Best FragPunk Shard Cards (Image via Bad Guitar Studios)

FragPunk

five

best

FragPunk Shard Cards

Best Shard Cards in FragPunk



1. Hud Remix

Description

2. Life Saver

Description

3. Death’s Embrace

Description

4. Tick Tock



Description

5. Dimension Travel



Description

features 169 Shard Cards at launch. With so many cards to choose from, it can be overwhelming which cards to unlock first. That’s why we’ve shortlisted thethat must unlock right away!FragPunk Shard Cards are a core feature that makes the game different from every other FPS out there. Both teams pick and choose these Shard Cards at the start of each round. These cards change the game in unique ways ensuring no two rounds play out the same way.These Shard Cards can only be unlocked by playing the game. Unlocking 169 cards can take some time so it's crucial to make the right choices in selecting your first few cards. Having said that, let’s take a look at the 5 best FragPunk Shard Cards that should be your top priority: “Tear off your health bar, swapping health with your target Lancer.”Hud Remix can save you from imminent death by swapping your health bar with your enemies. With the potential to completely flip the tides of a game, this card is one of the most powerful Shard Card in Frag Punk: “Deathrattle: Teammates can be revived once.”Life Saver lets you revive teammates in a round after they are dead. FragPunk’s game modes are all round based, meaning once you die, you die for the entire round. This is why this card can be game changing as your entire team essentially gets a free life which can easily overpower the enemy team.: “A Reaper appears behind injured enemies, slashing anyone in range.”Death’s Embrace spawns a Reaper behind an injured enemy and throws down an execution zone. This in turn deals 75 damage to the enemy. This is essentially a free kill card despite being one of the cheapest.: After 1 minute, disable all target sites. Converters can no longer be planted.”Tick Tock puts immense pressure on the enemy team by essentially giving them a one minute countdown to plant the converter. This can lead to mistakes from the enemy team and if they fail to plant in this time period, you win.: “All players can travel between two worlds; players in each world are invisible to each other.”Dimension Travel can teleport anyone to an alternate world where your team can jump on a secluded enemy player. This can also be used for a quick escape inorder to plant. Very situational and powerful when used in proper coordination with the team.Those were the best FragPunk Shard Cards for you to unlock first in the game. If you wanna know about the abilities and skills of all the lancers in FragPunk, check out Every FragPunk Lancer explained: All abilities and skills, how to play, and more
Article Summary: These shard cards can only be unlocked by playing the game. Unlocking 169 cards can take some time so it's crucial to make the right choices in selecting your first few cards. If you wanna know about the abilities and skills of all the lancers in fragpunk, check out everyfragpunk lancer explained.

Article Title: "Keep everything personal": Charlie McAvoy is heartbroken over Brad Marchand’s trade
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Charlie McAvoy’s struggle with teammate’s departure

Charlie McAvoy is feeling emotional after the Boston Bruins made several major trades before the NHL trade deadline. The team moved key players, including Brad Marchand to the Florida Panthers, Charlie Coyle to the Colorado Avalanche, and Brandon Carlo to the Toronto Maple Leafs. McAvoy shared his feelings on Instagram, posting photos and a broken heart emoji in response to Marchand’s departure.This isn’t the first time Charlie McAvoy had to say goodbye to close teammates. Last summer, he also expressed sadness when Jake DeBrusk and Matt Grzelcyk left for new teams. McAvoy’s reaction highlights how strong the bonds between teammates can be and how difficult it is to see friends go in the business of professional hockey.As for Boston, they acquired a conditional 2027 second-round pick, but here is the catch: “The conditional second-round draft pick will become a 2027 or 2028 first-round draft pick if Florida wins two rounds of the 2025 Stanley Cup Playoffs and Marchand appears in at least 50 percent of the team’s playoff games.”Boston is paying half of Marchand’s salary, making his trade to Florida even more shocking. With the Bruins struggling and a 4.2% playoff chance, change was necessary. Marchand hoped to retire in Boston, but a reunion in free agency is possible.During the NHL 4 Nations Face-Off in Montreal, Marchand and McAvoy put friendship aside, fully committed to their national teams. No greetings, no small talk, just fierce competition, game faces, and national pride.But hockey is unpredictable. When McAvoy suffered a serious AC joint injury and a shoulder infection that led to hospitalization, Marchand’s competitive edge quickly turned to concern. “I’ve reached out to him. I’m going to keep everything personal, but first and foremost, all you care about is the guy’s health, and I’m very happy to hear that he’s doing well,” Marchand put hockey aside, prioritizing McAvoy’s well-being over the game.Also Read: NHL Trade Deadline: The Boston Bruins are trading Brad Marchand to the Stanley Cup defending champion Florida Panthers Marchand’s fierce competitive spirit vanished the moment McAvoy was injured. In that instant, hockey no longer mattered, only his friend’s well-being did. In the end, friendship proved stronger than the game.
Article Summary: Charlie mcavoy is feeling emotional after the boston bruins made several major trades before the nhl trade deadline. The team moved key players, including brad marchand to the florida panthers, charlie coyle to the colorado avalanche, and brandon carlo to the toronto maple leafs.

Article Title: NBA insider gives major Karl-Anthony Towns injury update ahead of New York Knicks vs LA Clippers showdown
Article Text:
Karl-Anthony Towns. Image via: Justin Casterline/Getty Images

Karl-Anthony Towns

What happened to Karl-Anthony Towns?



Is Karl-Anthony Towns dealing with an injury?

The new New York Knicks star,, has been out of action, and NBA Alan Hahn has an update concerning his injury as the team is all set to face James Harden’s LA Clippers at the Intuit Dome, Inglewood, on March 7. The NBA star is also mourning personal loss, as per reports. However, the new report from the insider reveals that his knee is not in perfect condition for him to play any immediate matches.The Knicks have officially listed Karl-Anthony Towns as out for personal reasons without providing further details. While injuries are common late in the season, his absence does not appear to be health-related. Knicks head coach Tom Thibodeau addressed the situation before the team’s game against the Golden State Warriors, confirming that Towns would not be available but offering no timetable for his return.“When he’s ready to come back, obviously we want him back,” Thibodeau told reporters, per SNY’s Ian Begley. “But he needs some time right now.”Despite his absence, Towns’ father was seen courtside during the Knicks' 114-102 loss to the Warriors, adding intrigue to the situation. As the Knicks prepare for a crucial five-game road trip through early March, Thibodeau admitted uncertainty about whether Towns would travel with the team.Although the team has not linked Towns’ absence to an injury, there are indications that he has been dealing with lingering knee trouble. Knicks analyst Alan Hahn revealed that Towns has been playing through pain for some time now.“The knee is not good, but he’s fighting through it. He wants to play,” Hahn said, shedding light on what may be a significant factor in his recent struggles.Towns has been a major force for the New York Knicks in his debut season with the team. After being traded from the Minnesota Timberwolves ahead of the 2024-25 season. He is averaging 24.5 points per game— his highest since 2021-22— while also securing a career-best 13.4 rebounds per contest.Towns’ recent performances suggest that the knee issue has affected his game. Over his last three appearances, he has averaged just 14 points on 37% shooting.In Towns’ absence, the Knicks have turned to Mitchell Robinson, who recently returned from a long-term injury. The Knicks will need contributions from other key players, including Julius Randle.Also Read: NBA analysts Charles Barkley and Kendrick Perkins in war of words over media coverage propelling reaction from Stephen A. Smith: “Imma address his a** like the numbers on a house” For now, Knicks fans have to wait for the return of Towns. The team has another setback in the form of their star player, Jalen Brunson, who has also been out after Friday night’s game against the Clippers with a sprain. So far, his recovery timeline is also under wraps. Without Towns and Brunson, the Knicks facing the Clippers will certainly be tough, but the team has been one of the best in the league with 40 wins in their stats, and they are looking to grab the win against the Clippers.
Article Summary: New york knicks star karl-anthony towns is out for personal reasons. Knicks head coach tom thibodeau offered no timetable for towns' return. Towns’ father was seen courtside during the knicks' 114-102 loss to the golden state warriors.

Article Title: Stephen Curry’s mom Sonya Curry shares heartfelt reaction to her sons competing as NBA rivals: “It’s a win-win for me”
Article Text:
Sonya Curry and Stephen Curry. Image via: sacurry22/ Instagram

Stephen Curry

Seth Curry

Golden State Warriors

Charlotte Hornets

Sonya Curry

Sonya Curry shared a heartfelt message to her sons, Stephen and Seth Curry



Stephen Curry gave a special gift to his mother after his recent 56 points showdown



The Curry family recently had a memorable night at the Spectrum Center as they gathered to watchandgo head-to-head in the' matchup against the. For, it was a win-win situation as both of her sons were on the court. The Warriors ultimately came out victorious with a 119-101 win, with Steph contributing 21 points, while Seth struggled to make an impact, finishing with just one rebound. Stephen Curry and his brother Seth Curry are NBA rivals. While Steph has been a longtime Warriors star, standing as one of the greatest active athletes in the league. As for Seth, he joined the Charlotte Hornets in 2024. During the Golden State Warriors vs. Charlotte Hornets game on March 3, the Curry family enjoyed the game, and Sonya Curry was proud to see her sons on the court.Following the game, Sonya shared a heartfelt post on Instagram, featuring a family picture from the event.“Great time as always in Charlotte for the Curry men showdown!!! It’s a win-win for me – I can’t lose Lol!!❤️ It’s always a great time for friends and family to get together. Shoutout to the @spectrumcenter security staff that went over and beyond for us and made us comfortable. We appreciate you!”Sonya has been very supportive of her sons and often makes headlines showing up for their games.The Golden State Warriors' star put on an outstanding performance against the Orlando Magic, scoring a season-high 56 points and sinking 12 three-pointers. His stellar effort helped the Warriors secure their fifth consecutive victory, overcoming a 17-point deficit in the process.After his breathtaking performance, Steph celebrated in a way that only a son could. He did so by gifting his game-worn jersey to his mother, Sonya, who was watching from the stands. As he headed toward the locker room, he spotted her, called out “Mama,” and tossed the jersey in her direction.The touching moment was caught on camera, capturing the pure joy on Sonya’s face. However, in a lighthearted moment, she made the mistake of smelling the jersey— only to immediately regret it due to the sweat-soaked fabric.Also Read: Ayesha Curry Dazzles the Vanity Fair Oscars Party Red Carpet in Black, Even Without Stephen Curry Beside Her Sonya’s reaction sparked laughs among fans. But it has also earned heartfelt reactions on social media as it has reflected the loving moment of a mother and the son who has made his name as one of the greatest in the history of the league. Steph is currently averaging 24.2 points, 4.5 rebounds, and 6.3 assists with a 44.7 field goal percentage. As for Seth, he is averaging 6.2 points per game, 1.7 rebounds, and 0.7 assists alongside 46.8 field goal percentage.
Article Summary: Stephen curry gave a special gift to his mother after his recent 56 points showdown. The golden state warriors star put on an outstanding performance against the orlando magic, scoring a season-high 56 points. As he headed toward the locker room, he spotted her, called out “mama,” and tossed the jersey in her direction.

at the Spectrum Center in Charlotte on March 7. Here are the box score, player stats, game summary, and everything you need to know about the action-packedmatchup.The game saw a mixed performance from the Cleveland Cavaliers. Max Strus had a rough night, going 0-for-3 from the field, including three missed three-pointers. However, he made all three of his free throws and contributed three rebounds. Evan Mobley scored 19 points and 10 rebounds.Jarrett Allen added 14 points and 11 rebounds. Donovan Mitchell led the team in scoring with 24 points. On the other hand, Darius Garland contributed 20 points with three three-pointers on six attempts while hitting all nine of his free throws.The bench had some solid contributions, particularly from De’Andre Hunter and Sam Merrill. Hunter scored 15 points on efficient shooting. Merrill added 12 points. Ty Jerome also provided a small boost with six points, five rebounds, and three assists.Charlotte Hornets’ Miles Bridges had a stunning night, leading the team with 46 points. Bridges also grabbed eight rebounds while adding two assists and two steals.Jusuf Nurkić also made a big impact, finishing with 18 points and 15 rebounds.Also Read: NBA insider gives major Karl-Anthony Towns injury update ahead of New York Knicks vs LA Clippers showdown LaMelo Ball struggled with his shots, but he still managed to score 13 points. Ball also dished out seven assists.The Hornets fell short of just 1 point as they added another defeat to their stats, making it a total of 48 against their 14 wins.

Article Title: India vs New Zealand Live Streaming, ICC Champions Trophy 2025 Final: How to Watch IND vs NZ Final Match online for free
Article Text:
India vs New Zealand (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Shubman Gill on future of Rohit Sharma, approach, Champions Trophy final

Exclusive visuals of Team India arriving for practice before Champions Trophy final

India vs New Zealand Live Streaming: Where to Watch the IND vs NZ final Match Online & on TV

When is the India vs New Zealand ICC Champions Trophy 2025 final match?





India vs New Zealand Squads:

India Squad:

New Zealand Squad:

NEW DELHI: India are set to face New Zealand in a bid to win the Champions Trophy after a 12-year hiatus, confronting their historical difficulty in overcoming the resilient Kiwis in ICC tournaments, where New Zealand leads with a 10-6 record and a 3-1 advantage in knockout matches.Despite criticisms regarding India's extended preparation time in Dubai, such arguments are diminished as New Zealand is also well-acquainted with the conditions. India's strategy likely involves leveraging their spin quartet, which has proven effective on the Dubai International Cricket Stadium pitch, against New Zealand's batting lineup.Spinners Varun Chakravarthy, Kuldeep Yadav, Ravindra Jadeja, and Axar Patel have been key in India's bowling success, potentially challenging New Zealand's top batters, including Kane Williamson and Rachin Ravindra.New Zealand's spinners, however, have previously succeeded against India and aim to replicate that performance. The match also carries emotional weight for India, with veterans Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma potentially playing in one of their final ICC tournaments.Kohli's recent form includes a century and two fifties, while Sharma aims to contribute more significantly. India hopes for impactful performances from the rest of the team, including vice-captain Shubman Gill, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul, and Hardik Pandya, to secure a collective victory.This final presents an opportunity for both teams to claim the ICC ODI title, with India looking to add to their trophy cabinet and New Zealand seeking their first since 2000.The match will be live-streamed on JioHotstar and broadcast on Star Sports Network.The match is scheduled to begin at 2:30 pm IST, while the toss will take place at 2 pm on March 9, Sunday.Rohit Sharma(c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, Axar Patel, KL Rahul(w), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Mohammed Shami, Kuldeep Yadav, Varun Chakaravarthy, Washington Sundar, Arshdeep Singh, Harshit Rana, Rishabh PantWill Young, Rachin Ravindra, Kane Williamson, Daryl Mitchell, Tom Latham(w), Glenn Phillips, Michael Bracewell, Mitchell Santner(c), Matt Henry, Kyle Jamieson, William ORourke, Nathan Smith, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Jacob Duffy
Article Summary: India set to face new zealand in a bid to win the champions trophy after a 12-year hiatus. Match will be live-streamed on jiohotstar and broadcast on star sports network. The match is scheduled to begin at 2:30 pm ist, while the toss will take place at 2 pm.

Article Title: India Vs New Zealand Final: IND vs NZ, Champions Trophy Final: India vs New Zealand Pitch Report, Match Preview
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma and Mitchell Santner (Agency Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Team India gears up for Champions Trophy final with practice in Dubai

Can India overcome their knockout woes against New Zealand?

Shubman Gill on future of Rohit Sharma, approach, Champions Trophy final

Gautam Gambhir chases history! India coach targets maiden ICC trophy in first final

IND vs NZ Finals, Dubai Pitch Report

Squads (from):

India: Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakravarthy, Mohammed Shami , Washington Sundar, Harshit Rana.

Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Shreyas Iyer, KL Rahul, Rishabh Pant, Hardik Pandya, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Arshdeep Singh, Ravindra Jadeja, Varun Chakravarthy, , Washington Sundar, Harshit Rana. New Zealand: Mitchell Santner (c), Michael Bracewell, Mark Chapman, Devon Conway, Lockie Ferguson, Matt Henry, Tom Latham, Daryl Mitchell, Will O’Rourke, Glenn Phillips, Rachin Ravindra, Nathan Smith, Kane Williamson, Will Young, Jacob Duffy.

The match starts at 2:30 PM IST.

The Champions Trophy 2025 final will see India and New Zealand lock horns at the Dubai International Stadium on Sunday, March 9. Both teams have taken contrasting routes to the summit clash, but history suggests that this could be yet another classic Indo-Kiwi encounter.India, led by Rohit Sharma , have dominated throughout the tournament, relying on their balanced attack, which features a four-pronged spin force and a dependable top order. They breezed past Pakistan, Bangladesh and New Zealand in the group stage before overcoming Australia in the semi-finals.New Zealand, always punching above their weight in ICC tournaments, have had to fight through a more challenging road. They lost to India in their final group game, after victories against Pakistan and Bangladesh booked them a spot in the semis. They then defeated South Africa in the semi-finals. New Zealand will be confident in their ability to break India’s dream of reclaiming the Champions Trophy after 12 years.New Zealand have been a thorn in India’s side in ICC knockout matches. They lead the head-to-head record 3-1 in ICC knockouts, including wins in the 2019 ODI World Cup semi-final and the 2021 World Test Championship final. Despite India’s recent group-stage win over New Zealand by 44 runs, history suggests that the Kiwis thrive under high-pressure situations.For India, Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma remain key figures, but the team will also look towards Shubman Gill, Shreyas Iyer and KL Rahul to shoulder the batting responsibility. New Zealand, on the other hand, will bank on their all-round strength, with Rachin Ravindra and Kane Williamson pivotal in their semifinal triumph against South Africa.India's spin attack — featuring Kuldeep Yadav, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel and Varun Chakravarthy — has been their trump card throughout the tournament. However, New Zealand boasts an equally potent spin quartet of Mitchell Santner, Michael Bracewell, Rachin Ravindra and Glenn Phillips, making the battle of spin the defining factor in this final.The Dubai International Stadium has provided low-scoring thrillers throughout the tournament, and the final will be played on the same surface that hosted India’s clash against Pakistan in the group stage. The Emirates Cricket Board (ECB) has ensured a two-week rest period for all wickets, but the pitch is expected to be slow and gripping, favouring spinners.India’s spin quartet could have the edge in these conditions, but New Zealand’s slower bowlers will also be a major threat. Expect a low-to-mid-scoring contest, with 270-280 being a competitive total.
Article Summary: Champions trophy 2025 final will see india and new zealand lock horns at the dubai international stadium on sunday, march 9. Both teams have taken contrasting routes to the summit clash, but history suggests that this could be yet another classic indo-kiwi encounter.

The temperature in dubai for sunday’s match is expected to be around 34°c in the afternoon. There is no chance of rain, with clear skies and a bright and sunny day.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might reunite with $3 million shooting guard before playoffs to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic
Article Text:
Luka Doncic and LeBron James (Image via Getty Images)

Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James, left, passes as teammate guard Luka Doncic looks on during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Utah Jazz, Monday, Feb. 10, 2025, in Los Angeles. (Image via AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill)

The Los Angeles Lakers are making strategic moves as they gear up for the playoffs, with reports indicating that Jordan Goodwin ’s two-way contract will soon be converted into a standard NBA deal. This decision comes as the team continues its impressive run, winning seven straight games and 18 of their last 21. To make room for Goodwin, the Lakers are likely to waive either Cam Reddish or Alex Len, with Reddish being the more probable candidate.Jordan Goodwin, a 26-year-old guard, has quickly become a valuable asset for the Los Angeles Lakers since joining the team in early February. Over eight games, he has averaged 6.1 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 1.0 assist in 16.9 minutes per game. Goodwin's achievements have not gone unnoticed, even though a recent ailment to his right ankle has slowed his progress. He has received numerous compliments from head coach JJ Redick, who has referred to him as a vital rotation player.Jovan Buha of The Athletic reports that in order to optimize financial flexibility, the Los Angeles Lakers are anticipated to convert Goodwin's deal as late as feasible. "I do expect him to be converted at the end of the season as late as possible, and then be on the playoff roster. ... He's kind of become the 9th man, and you could argue that depending on the night and depending on the matchup, he should be like the 8th man," Buha said on his podcast . He also hinted at a potential multi-year deal for Goodwin in the future, stating, "I think he's going to get a multi-year contract, longer-term later in the season."Jordan Goodwin’s journey to the Lakers began after they waived Armel Traore to open a roster spot. A four-year NBA veteran, he has previously played for Washington, Phoenix, and Memphis, holding career averages of 6.4 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 2.6 assists across 128 games. His versatility and defensive prowess have made him a reliable option off the bench.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could bag $33 million ex-Toronton Raptors star to bolster squad's defensive end As the Los Angeles Lakers continue their push for playoff success, the decision to convert Jordan Goodwin’s contract reflects their commitment to strengthening their roster. With Cam Reddish likely on the way out, the team is betting on Goodwin’s ability to contribute in high-pressure situations. Fans will be watching closely to see how this move impacts the Lakers’ postseason aspirations.
Article Summary: Jordan goodwin, a 26-year-old guard, has quickly become a valuable asset for the los angeles lakers since joining the team in early february. Over eight games, he has averaged 6.1 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 1.0 assist in 16.9 minutes per game. The lakers are likely to waive either cam reddish or alex len, with reddish being the more probable candidate.

Article Title: Ice Cube’s son O'Shea Jackson Jr. slams harsh Los Angeles Lakers greatness criteria after LeBron James snub sparks debate
Article Text:
(Image Via Adam Pantozzi, Michael Tullberg/Getty Images)

LeBron James snubbed by Ric Bucher’s Los Angeles Lakers greatness criteria



'LeBron isn’t an all-time Lakers great!’: Ric Bucher sparks heated debate | SPEAK

Do Ric Bucher’s standards exclude Los Angeles Lakers icons like Jerry West, Elgin Baylor, and Wilt Chamberlain from all-time great status?

On Tuesday, Fox Sports analyst Ric Bucher sparked debate on the latest episode of SPEAK by claiming that LeBron James does not qualify as an all-time Lakers great. Bucher argued that to earn that distinction, a player must spend at least 10 years with the franchise and win a minimum of three championships. Bucher’s comments immediately sparked backlash, with O'Shea Jackson Jr. , son of rapper Ice Cube , leading the charge. Taking to X, he passionately challenged Bucher’s criteria, questioning its fairness and historical accuracy.O'Shea Jackson Jr. didn’t hold back in his criticism of Bucher’s criteria, taking to X on Thursday to highlight how many Lakers legends wouldn’t meet those same standards. "Someone tell Jerry West’s family. Wilt Chamberlain ’s family. Gail Goodrich. Pau Gasol. Elgin Baylor’s family. Bob McAdoo and Jamaal Wilkes that Ric Bucher says they aren’t Laker greats," he wrote. His post struck a chord with fans who believe that greatness isn’t just about longevity and championships but about impact, legacy, and contributions to the franchise.Since joining the Lakers in 2018, LeBron James has been a game-changer for the franchise, guiding them to an NBA Championship in the 2019-20 season—their first in a decade. Year after year, he has put up stellar numbers, averaging 26.8 points, 8.1 assists, 8.0 rebounds, and 1.1 steals per game while shooting an impressive 51.4% from the field. Despite these accomplishments, Bucher insists that James doesn’t qualify as a true Lakers great due to his tenure and championship count.However, many fans and analysts strongly disagree, noting that some of the most legendary players in Lakers history also fail to meet Bucher’s strict criteria. This has led to widespread debate over what truly defines greatness within one of the NBA’s most storied franchises.If Bucher's definition of a Lakers great were applied across history, some of the most celebrated figures in the franchise’s past would not qualify. Jerry West , despite being the inspiration behind the NBA logo and spending 14 seasons with the Lakers, only won one championship—falling short of Bucher’s three-title benchmark. Similarly, Elgin Baylor , a 10-time All-NBA forward, was a dominant scorer but never secured a championship ring.Gail Goodrich, another Lakers Hall of Famer, played nine seasons in Los Angeles and contributed to the 1972 championship but also fails to meet Bucher’s 10-year standard. Even Wilt Chamberlain , a towering presence in Lakers history, played only five seasons with the team and won just one title, making him ineligible under Bucher’s rules.Also Read: LeBron James scales the historic peak of 50,000 points in NBA Ric Bucher’s criteria for defining a Lakers great has sparked heated debate, as it leaves out some of the biggest names in franchise history. While championships and longevity matter, many believe that impact, leadership, and overall contributions to the Lakers’ legacy are just as crucial. LeBron James has already proven himself as one of basketball’s greatest, and whether he fits Bucher’s definition or not, his mark on the Lakers is undeniable.This debate also underscores the changing expectations of modern athletes. With players like LeBron James, who consistently break records and adapt their game, the traditional criteria for greatness may no longer suffice. The new era of basketball emphasizes a player’s ability to impact the game across multiple dimensions, not just through championships and tenure. The debate over what defines greatness will always spark discussion.
Article Summary: Fox sports analyst ric bucher claimed that lebron james does not qualify as an all-time lakers great. Bucher argued that to earn that distinction, a player must spend at least 10 years with the franchise and win a minimum of three championships. O'shea jackson jr. challenged bucher's criteria, questioning its fairness and historical accuracy.

Article Title: NBA Offseason Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might make a move for $107 million Toronto Raptors star guard, parting ways with Dalton Knecht?
Article Text:
Dalton Knecht and Luka Doncic (Image via Jayne Kamin-Oncea-Imagn Images)

"Knecht would be a great addition for Toronto,"

"His three-point shooting addresses a key need, and his ability to play multiple positions offers flexibility. If he improves defensively and becomes more consistent on offense, he could become a solid contributor for a championship contender."

RJ Barrett (Image via Getty)

"With the Toronto Raptors envisioning a frontcourt of Scottie Barnes and newly extended Brandon Ingram along with former lottery pick Gradey Dick at shooting guard, where does that leave current leading scorer RJ Barrett’s future?"

"Based on conversations before the deadline, RJ Barrett could be a trade candidate to monitor this summer."

The Los Angeles Lakers are reportedly considering a bold move this summer to bolster their roster, potentially trading rookie forward Dalton Knecht to acquire former New York Knicks star RJ Barrett from the Toronto Raptors . This comes as the Lakers continue to ride the wave of success following their acquisition of Luka Doncic , who has been instrumental in their recent seven-game winning streak, propelling them to a 39-21 record and the No. 2 seed in the Western Conference. Luka Doncic ’s partnership with LeBron James has been a game-changer for the Los Angeles Lakers , driving their offense to a No. 12 ranking with a 117.3 offensive rating over the last seven games. However, their defensive performance has been equally impressive, boasting a league-leading 106.2 defensive rating during the same stretch. This resurgence has sparked speculation that the Lakers might be willing to part ways with Knecht to secure a proven talent like RJ Barrett.Heavy Sports' David Grubb noted.The Los Angeles Lakers previously attempted to trade Knecht during the deadline in a deal for Charlotte Hornets center Mark Williams, which ultimately fell through. This time, they could package Knecht, along with Gabe Vincent and Jarred Vanderbilt’s salaries, and draft capital to pursue RJ Barrett. The Raptors, who are reportedly open to moving Barrett, might find this offer appealing as they look to reshape their roster around Scottie Barnes and Brandon Ingram.HoopsHype’s Michael Scotto questioned.Barrett, who was traded to Toronto from the Knicks during the 2023-24 season, has been a consistent performer, averaging 21.7 points, 6.4 rebounds, and 5.7 assists in 49 games this season. His versatility and scoring ability make him an attractive target for the Los Angeles Lakers, who could see him as a perfect fit alongside Luka Doncic and James.Also read: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angele Lakers might reunite with $3 million shooting guard before playoffs to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic As the offseason approaches, the Lakers’ pursuit of RJ Barrett could signal their commitment to building a championship-caliber team for the 2025-26 season. With Luka Doncic and James leading the charge, adding a player of Barrett’s caliber might be the final piece needed to elevate the Lakers back to title contention.
Article Summary: The los angeles lakers are reportedly considering a bold move this summer to bolster their roster. They could trade rookie forward dalton knecht to acquire former new york knicks star rj barrett from the toronto raptors. This comes as the lakers continue to ride the wave of success following their acquisition of luka doncic.

Article Title: Will LaMelo Ball play tonight against the Brooklyn Nets? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (March 8, 2025)
Article Text:
Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight? (Image via NBA)

Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight? Charlotte Hornets injury report for tonight’s game against the Brooklyn Nets (March 8, 2025)

Hornets injury report March 8 (Image via NBA)

Brooklyn Nets injury report for tonight’s game against the Charlotte Hornets (March 8, 2025)

When and where to watch the Charlotte Hornets play tonight against the Brooklyn Nets (March 8, 2025)?

The Charlotte Hornets are set to host the Brooklyn Nets on Saturday, March 8, at the Spectrum Center, but all eyes are on the Hornets’ injury report, particularly the status of star guard LaMelo Ball. Ball, the team’s leading scorer averaging 25.8 points per game, has been a bright spot in an otherwise challenging season for the Hornets, who hold a 14-48 record. However, his recent performances have raised concerns about his health and availability moving forward. LaMelo Ball will be playing tonight against the Brooklyn Nets. He is not listed in the team’s injury report and is in the projected starters. In the last 20 games, Ball’s numbers have been decent, with averages of just 22.3 points, 5.4 rebounds, and 6.8 assists.The Hornets are already dealing with a lengthy injury list. Grant Williams (ACL), Tre Mann (back), and Brandon Miller (wrist) are all out for the season, while Josh Okogie (hamstring) remains sidelined. Mark Williams (foot) is listed as day-to-day, leaving the team thin in key areas. Ball’s potential health concerns could further complicate matters for a team already battling to stay competitive.On the other side, the Nets come into the game with their own injury woes. De’Anthony Melton (ACL) and Cameron Johnson (knee) are out, while Noah Clowney (ankle) is day-to-day. Despite their 21-41 record, the Nets have shown flashes of resilience, led by Nic Claxton and Keon Johnson, who have been consistent contributors.The Hornets’ struggles extend beyond injuries. They rank 28th in the league in scoring (105.4 points per game) and 14th in points allowed (113.1 per game). Their -483 scoring differential highlights the uphill battle they face nightly. Miles Bridges has been a standout, averaging 23.8 points and 8.5 rebounds in the last 20 games, but the team’s success heavily relies on Ball’s ability to perform at his usual elite level.As the Hornets prepare to face the Nets, fans and analysts alike will be watching Ball closely. His health and performance could determine not only the outcome of this game but also the trajectory of the Hornets’ season. Tip-off is set for 6 p.m. ET, with the game available on FDSSE, YES, and Fubo.Also read: Will Giannis Antetokounmpo play tonight against the Orlando Magic? Latest update on the Milwaukee Bucks star's injury report (March 8, 2025) For now, the question remains: Is LaMelo Ball fully healthy, and can he return to form to help the Hornets salvage what’s left of their season? Only time will tell.

All eyes are on the hornets’ injury report, particularly the status of star guard lamelo ball. Ball, the team’s leading scorer averaging 25.8 points per game, has been a bright spot in an otherwise challenging season for the hornets.

Article Title: “Taylor is really gripped by fear”: Taylor Swift is anxious as Travis Kelce deliberates return for 2025 NFL season
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift was reportedly "gripped by fear" over Travis Kelce's decision of returning for the 2025 NFL season

Following the loss of the Kansas City Chiefs during Super Bowl 59 to the Eagles, there was uncertainty around Travis Kelce 's future in the NFL. He confessed during the New Heights podcast that he took time considering whether to continue playing or hang up his boots. He, however, finally decided to remain in the league. Radar Online, however, indicated that Taylor Swift was exceedingly worried about this decision, citing its importance not only for his career but for their relationship.After the Kansas City Chiefs' gut-wrenching defeat to the Philadelphia Eagles in Super Bowl 59, rumors circulated regarding Travis Kelce's NFL future. Fans and pundits alike wondered if the superstar tight end would come back for another year or retire after the crushing loss.Kelce himself cleared the air about the uncertainty on the New Heights podcast, saying that he himself did not know what he would do next in the moments after the game. He revealed that he had taken time to consider his options before making a conclusive decision regarding his football future.Finally, Kelce decided to keep playing, deciding to play on rather than retire from the sport. His long-time girlfriend, global singing sensation Taylor Swift, though, was highly invested in the consequences of his choice, and by a Radar Online report, worried about the heaviness of it all. According to the report, Swift feared what route Kelce would end up going down, stressing the importance the decision held for him professionally as well as personally, for himself and for the couple's future.A source close to Swift told the outlet, "Taylor is really gripped by fear over which way he's going to jump because it has big ramifications for their relationship, but also, it is totally his call. Travis is totally adamant that Taylor would never pressure him into anything, insisting she’ll support whatever he decides – but let’s be real, it’s no secret she’s itching to settle down.”The report also indicated that both Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift were keen on spending more quality time with each other, something that has not been easy given their hectic schedules. Since they started dating, their hectic schedules—Kelce's NFL commitments and Swift's global music career—have restricted their time together, making it hard to give their relationship the priority it deserves.Also Read: “Their fantasy bubble has been popped”: Taylor Swift is clearly happy for her beau Travis Kelce's retirement decision, but she had some reservations Furthermore, Radar Online asserted that Swift was worried about the possible public outcry if Kelce had decided to retire. Being one of the most powerful celebrities, she feared that others would hold her responsible for his decision, surmising that their relationship was behind him leaving the sport. This concern apparently contributed to the tension surrounding Kelce's decision, making the whole ordeal even more stressful for the couple.
Article Summary: Taylor swift was reportedly "gripped by fear" over travis kelce's decision of returning for the 2025 nfl season. Radar online, however, indicated that taylor swift was exceedingly worried about this decision, citing its importance not only for his career but for their relationship.

Article Title: "Pay me to my value": Micah Parsons voiced his desire for a contract that accurately reflects his value to the Cowboys
Article Text:
Image via AP

Micah Parsons has publicly expressed his desire for a contract that accurately represents his value to the team

Micah Parsons is advocating for a contract that accurately depicts his influence on the Cowboys, stating that his role goes beyond the position of just a linebacker. During an interview with USA Sports Today, he expressed frustration about being limited to a single label as a position, highlighting his versatility as both a pass-rusher and coverage player. With contract negotiations approaching, Parsons is signaling that he wants to be paid for his full value, reigniting discussion on how hybrid defenders are paid in today's NFL.Dallas Cowboys sensation Micah Parsons has come out publicly stating that he wants a contract that reflects his value to the team. In an interview with USA Sports Today, Parsons explained how frustrated he was being labeled purely as a linebacker, stressing that his contribution to the team goes far beyond one position.The dynamic defender, with his versatility and game-altering skills, feels that his position must be considered more widely when contract negotiations are concerned. Parsons has consistently demonstrated himself to be a force to be reckoned with in both pass-rushing and coverage, rendering him one of the Cowboys' defense most valuable players.As he looks to negotiate a contract that is commensurate with his contributions, Parsons is sending a message that he expects to be paid accordingly. His remarks have generated debate regarding how teams assess hybrid defenders and whether old-school position designations should continue to determine contract value in today's changing NFL.Parsons explained, "It's just a terminology that people use, you know, to describe a player. I think how I look at it is like pay me to my value, like Basketball, like pay me what I'm worth. Like I don't want to be labeled as like a defensive because I do more than just play defense, I play all over, I feel like I help expand.”Parsons' comments reveal ongoing contract negotiations between the Cowboys and Parsons. Parsons' management is seeking a lucrative deal based on his significant impact, while the Cowboys aim to free up cap space to secure Parsons for the long term, creating a potentially win-win situation for both parties and fans.Also Read : NFL Rumors: New York Giants are said to be making progress in acquiring Aaron Rodgers at quarterback Parsons, a key player for the Cowboys since joining in 2021, signed a four-year contract worth $17.1 million with a fifth-year option. In 2025, the Cowboys exercised this option to keep Parsons for the season while considering a long-term deal, keeping fans on the edge of their seats.
Article Summary: Dallas cowboys sensation micah parsons has come out publicly stating that he wants a contract that reflects his value to the team. In an interview with usa sports today, parsons explained how frustrated he was being labeled purely as a linebacker. Parsons' management is seeking a lucrative deal based on his significant impact, while the cowboys aim to free up cap space.

Article Title: Travis Kelce struggles to choose between football and showbiz, leaving Taylor Swift uncertain about their future
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift is taking the uncertainty of her future with Travis Kelce hard

Travis Kelce stands at a career fork in the road, caught between remaining in the NFL or transitioning into entertainment. His increasing presence in the media has created speculation that he will leave football behind. Taylor Swift is said to be worried about how his choice will affect their relationship, considering they already have busy schedules. With both his professional career and personal life on the line, Kelce's decision might determine not only his future in football but also his future with Swift.Travis Kelce stands at a critical juncture in his professional life, and everyone—from his superstar partner, Taylor Swift—is watching which direction he will ultimately head. In the aftermath of the Kansas City Chiefs' gut-wrenching defeat at Super Bowl 59 , the tight end is torn between staying in his storied NFL career or pursuing the glitz and glamour of show business.Kelce has already gained fame outside of football, having tried his hand at television, commercials, and media appearances, fueling rumors that he might go full-time showbiz. As he takes his time weighing his options, Swift is said to be taking the uncertainty hard. With their very public relationship and already busy schedules, Kelce's decision could have major repercussions for the future of the couple.The pop star is reportedly eagerly waiting for his choice, aware that it would help them spend more time together or make their situation even more complicated with regards to balancing their separate careers. With too much hanging in the balance—both professionally and personally—Kelce's next step is one that would change not only his life but that of his romance with Swift as well.Swift is uncertain about two potential outcomes in the near future: more time together with Kelce, which they both desire, or too much togetherness, which can potentially unravel even the strongest relationships, according to insiders. “If Travis does retire, it could drastically change his and Taylor’s lives together. He would be around far more – and who knows, she may start to get sick of him!” an insider warned.“Taylor is really gripped by fear over which way he’s going to jump because it has big ramifications for their relationship, but also, it is totally his call. Travis is totally adamant that Taylor would never pressure him into anything, insisting she’ll support whatever he decides – but let’s be real, it’s no secret she’s itching to settle down.”They added, “Imagine if he retires; they could finally have more time together! They both really miss each other when he’s off training or jet-setting around the country for games. But on the flip-side there is the danger they would then be spending too much time together and they both know this can spell the death of a relationship.”Also Read: “Their fantasy bubble has been popped”: Taylor Swift is clearly happy for her beau Travis Kelce's retirement decision, but she had some reservations
Article Summary: Travis kelce stands at a career fork in the road, caught between remaining in the nfl or transitioning into entertainment. His increasing presence in the media has created speculation that he will leave football behind. Taylor swift is said to be worried about how his choice will affect their relationship, considering they already have busy schedules.

Article Title: “He's the perfect representation of Buffalo”: Retired Bills all-pro Micah Hyde confident in Buffalo’s Super Bowl future under Josh Allen
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Micah Hyde's belief in the Bills' championship prospects is based on quarterback Josh Allen

Buffalo Bills safety Micah Hyde retired from the NFL after joining the team's practice squad for the stretch run after the team's AFC Championship Game loss to the Kansas City Chiefs. Despite not being an active player in the locker room, Hyde helped establish a foundation for the team, which he believes will eventually become a Super Bowl team in the coming years. Hyde's belief in the Bills' championship prospects is based on quarterback Josh Allen , who was drafted by Buffalo a year after Hyde signed as a free agent.Micah Hyde's NFL career ended just three points from a Super Bowl appearance, as the Buffalo Bills lost to the Kansas City Chiefs in the AFC Championship Game. Following his return to the team's practice squad for the remainder of the season, the veteran safety made his retirement official.While he won't be a locker room presence going forward, Hyde leaves an indelible mark on the organization. His contributions and leadership have established a solid foundation, and he has no doubt that Buffalo will get to the Super Bowl in the future."Wherever that Super Bowl is played, I'll tell you what, the Hydes are gonna be there. I don't care how much it costs, we're gonna be there celebrating it, too. Forever, I'm a fan with Bills Mafia. It's gonna happen," said Hyde during an appearance on the Jim Rome Show last week.Hyde's belief in the Bills' championship prospects is based on quarterback Josh Allen, who was drafted by Buffalo a year after Hyde signed as a free agent. "This league is a beast. I feel like with the pieces that Buffalo has, obviously, starting with 17, he's one of a kind. He just won MVP. I think it's five straight years with 40-plus touchdowns. That's insane," said Hyde.Allen won the NFL MVP award for the first time in seven seasons, breaking Jim Kelly's franchise record for total touchdowns, a record he broke for the fourth time in five years. "Just what he's been able to do, and not just on the field, but off the field. He's the perfect representation of Buffalo. Just who he is. He's a homegrown person out of California, loves his teammates. He's like a little kid, having fun playing football. It starts with him," said Hyde.Hyde, who played with Buffalo during Sean McDermott's first year as head coach, expressed his admiration for the Bills' team during a conversation with Rome. "Then, having Sean McDermott and Brandon Beane. Beane's gonna put the pieces together, and Sean's gonna be a leader of men. Whenever you have pieces like that, that are steering the ship, you're always gonna have a chance. It's gonna come down to a play or two here or there," said Hyde.Also Read: “I'm p****d off at the world”: Travis Kelce admits he wasn't as focused as he should have been in Super Bowl LIX
Article Summary: Buffalo bills safety micah hyde retired from the nfl after the team's afc championship game loss to the kansas city chiefs. Despite not being an active player in the locker room, hyde helped establish a foundation for the team, which he believes will eventually become a super bowl team.

Article Title: "They’re not good at this": Bill Simmons warns Tom Brady’s role with Raiders could be ‘Dangerous’ for the franchise’s future
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Bill Simmons Opens Up on Why Tom Brady’s Raiders Ownership Could Spell Trouble



Bleakest NFL Teams, QB Draft Drama, and Sunny Washington Times | The Bill Simmons Podcast

Amid the process of NFL picking, the Los Angeles Raiders are making preparations to be in an important place: Green Bay and steer the ship by none other than Tom Brady. This "seven-time" world-beater will be the major factor in securing a good franchise quarterback to the club. An enthusiast for Brady like Bill Simmons gets excited by all this, but even he is concerned about Brady's role in the franchise.The Las Vegas Raiders' decision to bring Tom Brady on board as a minority owner has sparked immense excitement among fans. The move, approved by the league in October 2024, not only connects the franchise to a seven-time Super Bowl champion but also fuels speculation about Brady’s potential influence in shaping the team’s future—especially when it comes to finding their next franchise quarterback. However, while many are thrilled about his involvement, not everyone is convinced that Brady’s greatness on the field will translate to success in the front office.Media personality and longtime New England Patriots fan Bill Simmons has raised concerns about Brady’s ability to evaluate quarterbacks. As reported by Awful Announcing, Simmons addressed the topic on The Bill Simmons Podcast, pointing out that legendary players don’t always make great decision-makers.“This is a dangerous thing where you have him running a football team thinking he knows what’s best with quarterbacks because he was a great quarterback,” Simmons remarked. He further emphasized that history has shown how former elite players often struggle in management roles. “Because all of the evidence with the great players we’ve had, name the sport, mostly they’re not good at this. They think they’re seeing things that other people don’t see, and it’s not actually rational.”Simmons’ concerns stem from a common issue in professional sports: the assumption that elite players naturally excel at talent evaluation. Many former greats have struggled when transitioning to front-office roles, with John Elway’s tenure as the Denver Broncos’ general manager serving as a prime example.One of the biggest questions surrounding Brady’s involvement with the Raiders is how much influence he will have on their quarterback selection in the 2025 NFL Draft. With Las Vegas potentially looking for a long-term solution at the position, having Brady’s input might seem like a huge advantage. However, Simmons argues that his presence in the decision-making room could create complications.“I’m just saying it’s not a slam dunk. Part of the problem is if you and I are in that room with Tom Brady and we were like, ‘yo man, we think Darnold, look…’ and he’s like, ‘I’m out. I watched that game and he doesn’t have it, I’m out,’” Simmons said. “Are we gonna argue with Tom Brady? It’s just now — it’s this one voice that sees what he wants to see.”This raises a critical point: Will Brady’s opinions be too influential, even if they aren’t always correct? His unmatched playing experience could give him valuable insight, but it also comes with the risk of bias—seeing the game through the lens of his own greatness rather than an objective evaluator.Brady’s presence in the Raiders’ ownership group guarantees that all eyes will be on the team’s quarterback decisions moving forward. His involvement could be a game-changer if he successfully helps the franchise land its next star signal-caller. But as Simmons pointed out, history suggests that not all legendary players thrive in this kind of role.Also Read: Kelly Stafford might have accidentally revealed Matthew Stafford’s remaining years in the NFL While some may take pleasure in seeing if Brady struggles in his new position, the NFL will ultimately determine whether his transition from the field to the front office is a success. Whether his impact leads to triumph or proves to be a cautionary tale remains to be seen, but one thing is certain—his influence on the Raiders is just beginning.
Article Summary: The las vegas raiders' decision to bring tom brady on board as a minority owner has sparked immense excitement among fans. Media personality and longtime new england patriots fan bill simmons has raised concerns about brady’s ability to evaluate quarterbacks. Many former greats have struggled when transitioning to front-office roles.
